definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: hook, ring, fetter;—[[חַח]] abs. Ex 35:22; sf. [[חַחִי]] Is 37:29, 2Ki 19:28; pl. [[חַחִים]] Ez Eze 19:4 + 2 t. + Ez Eze 29:4 Qr (Kt erron. [[חחיים]], v. infr.);—

hook, ring, in nose of captive [[וְשַׂמְתִּי חַחִי]] [[בְּאַפֶָּךָ]] Is 37:29 = 2Ki 19:28 (cf. [[בַּחׂחִים]] 2Ch 33:11, v. [[חוֹחַ]] supr.); so of princes of Judah, under fig. of young lions Ez Eze 19:4, Eze 19:9 (in v:Eze 19:9 transp:, so that [[בחחים]] foll. [[הביא]] as v:Eze 19:4; so Co); in jaws of crocodile (metaph. of Pharaoh), c. [[נתן]] Ez Eze 29:4, cf. Eze 38:4 (but LXX om. and sense opposes, cf. Co and—dub.—Da).
hook, ring as ornament, perhaps nose-ring (others brooch, see VB), Ex 35:22 (P; ‖[[נֶזֶם]], [[טַבַּעַת]], [[כּוּמָז]]).
